CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(NOW())), ROUND(9 * ( (5 * FLOOR((DATEVALUE(NOW()) - DATE(1996, 01, 01)) / 7) + MIN(5, MOD(DATEVALUE(NOW()) - DATE(1996, 01, 01), 7) + MIN(1, 24 / 10 * (MOD(NOW() - DATETIMEVALUE('1996-01-01 13:00:00'), 1))) )) - (5 * FLOOR((DATEVALUE(Large_Order_Status_Change__c) - DATE(1996, 01, 01)) / 7) + MIN(5, MOD(DATEVALUE(Large_Order_Status_Change__c) - DATE(1996, 01, 01), 7) + MIN(1, 24 / 10 * (MOD( IF(HOUR(TIMEVALUE(Large_Order_Status_Change__c)) >= 13 && HOUR(TIMEVALUE(Large_Order_Status_Change__c)) <= 23, NOW(), IF( HOUR(TIMEVALUE(Large_Order_Status_Change__c)) < 13, DATETIMEVALUE( TEXT(DATEVALUE(Large_Order_Status_Change__c)) + " " + '13:00:00' ), DATETIMEVALUE( TEXT(DATEVALUE(Large_Order_Status_Change__c)) + " " + '23:00:00' ) ) ) - DATETIMEVALUE('1996-01-01 13:00:00'), 1 ))) )) ),2),(NOW()- CreatedDate)*24)
CustomField.label: Time in Large Order Status (bus.)
